articles.title: Is Fastly Fairly Priced Around $10 After its Volatile Multi Year Slide?
articles.mainIdea: Is Fastly Fairly Priced Around $10 After its Volatile Multi Year Slide?
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Is Fastly Fairly Priced Around $10 After its Volatile Multi Year Slide?. Wondering if Fastly is a hidden bargain or a value trap at around $10 a share? You are not alone. This is exactly the kind of stock where valuation really matters. Over the last week Fastly is up 4.2%, but that still leaves it down 10.2% over the past month and only modestly ahead, with a 3.9% gain, over the last year after a volatile 5 year slide of 88.5%. Recently, Fastly has stayed in the conversation as investors debate the long term prospects of edge computing and content delivery...

articles.title: Can Fastly’s (FSLY) IDC AppSec Study Reframe Its Moat Around Developer Productivity And Resilience?
articles.mainIdea: Can Fastly’s (FSLY) IDC AppSec Study Reframe Its Moat Around Developer Productivity And Resilience?
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Can Fastly’s (FSLY) IDC AppSec Study Reframe Its Moat Around Developer Productivity And Resilience?. Earlier this month, Fastly, Inc. was added to the NASDAQ Composite Index and released a joint study with IDC showing that organizations with advanced Application Security programs achieve materially better outcomes in developer productivity, user experience, and application availability. The IDC partnership positions Fastly as a thought leader in modern AppSec by quantifying how higher-maturity security practices can translate into fewer breaches and stronger operational performance for... Related tickers mentioned: ^IXIC.
